nhentai-api > API

API 

class API

Class used for interaction with nHentai API.

Constructor

new API(options: ?nHentaiOptions) → {}

Applies provided options on top of defaults.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
options ?nHentaiOptions

<optional>

 {}

Options to apply.
